snippet.title: Funeralopolis | Last Days
snippet.description:
The game is out NOW!!!

https://banana-jeff.itch.io/dniostatnie

Funeralopolis | Last Days is a story oriented and text heavy game with a linear structure, featuring light horror elements. 
__

The sky above the city of Huta-Grobno has been covered by a layer of unnaturally thick clouds and a wave of abnormal phenomena soon followed. 
Now one of those strange things has appeared inside your apartment... This can’t be good.
__

It's a small indie project with an around an hourplaytime, that serves as a prologue to the world of Funeralopolis.
